urls.title: Water companies could face legal action after investigation launched into sewage treatment works - Ofwat
urls.description: The Environment Agency (EA) and Ofwat have launched a major investigation into sewage treatment works, after new checks led to water companies admitting that they could be releasing unpermitted sewage discharges into rivers and watercourses. […]
